bibl.title: Ptolemy V and the Rosetta Decree: the Egyptianization of the Ptolemaic Kingship.
bibl.note: The Pharaonic titulature found in the Raphia and Rosetta decrees [ed.: Heinz-Josef THISSEN, Studien zum Raphiadekret (Meisenheim am Glan, 1966) pp. 10-11; and O.G.I.S. I, 90] cannot be used to suggest that the kingship of Ptolemies IV and V was Egyptianized.
JOHNSON Carl G., Ptolemy V and the Rosetta Decree: the Egyptianization of the Ptolemaic Kingship.
